CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 28, 1953, pg. 30, reads: "'Command Performance' Real-Gone Fun Package; 'Chuck Fly' Flies Right - At 'Command Performance' - When the Program Department of the Centre Avenue YMCA held its third annual 'Command Performance' show at Schenley High School Auditorium Tuesday night as a benefit for the World Service Fund among the top-drawer acts which received loud applause were, left to right: ...the Mellow Larks Combo... Members of the Mellow Larks group are David Robinson, guitar; Carl Struthers, trumpet; Donald Robinson, drums; David Hill, tenor saxophone, and Fred Tooks, pianist and leader. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of the Mellow Larks band, from left: David Robinson on guitar, Carl Struthers on trumpet, Donald Robinson on drums inscribed "Daddy Downbeat," David Hill on tenor saxophone, and pianist Fred Tooks, posed in hallway
